cards.name: Abundance
cards.text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: This replacement effect replaces the draw, so nothing that triggers on a draw will trigger.

If you use this on a multi-card draw, each replaced draw is handled separately. In other words, you reveal and then put on the bottom of the library for the first card, then do the same for the second, and so on. In a multi-card draw you do not have to choose how many of those draws will be replaced before you do any drawing or use of this card.
If no card of the chosen type is found before your library empties, you don’t get a card, but you do get to order all the cards in your library any way you choose.

If your library is empty, Abundance can prevent you from losing the game for being unable to draw a card. If an effect or turn-based action would cause you to draw a card, you can replace that draw with Abundance’s replacement effect. (It doesn’t matter that you’d be unable to actually draw a card.) Since Abundance’s effect has you put a card into your hand instead of drawing a card, you’ll never be forced to draw a card with an empty library.

foreignNames.flavor: 「这巷子不太安全。 跟我来，我可以领你走回市集广场。」

cards.originalText: When Civic Wayfinder comes into play, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Commune with Nature
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: If you don’t reveal a creature card, put all the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

foreignNames.name: Kommunikation mit der Natur
foreignNames.text: Schau dir die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst eine Kreaturenkarte darunter offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest der Karten in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: En comunión con la naturaleza
foreignNames.text: Mira las primeras cinco cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta de criatura que se encuentre entre ellas y ponerla en tu mano. Pon el resto en la parte inferior de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.

foreignNames.name: Communion avec la nature
foreignNames.text: Regardez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler une carte de créature parmi elles et la mettre dans votre main. Mettez les autres au-dessous de votre bibliothèque, dans n'importe quel ordre.

foreignNames.name: Comunione con la Natura
foreignNames.text: Guarda le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelare una carta creatura tra esse e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.

foreignNames.name: 自然との融和
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを見る。 あなたはその中のクリーチャー・カードを１枚公開してあなたの手札に加えてもよい。 残りのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。

foreignNames.name: Comungar com a Natureza
foreignNames.text: Olhe os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode revelar um card de criatura dentre eles e colocá-lo em sua mão. Coloque o resto no fundo de seu grimório em qualquer ordem.

foreignNames.name: Общение с Природой
foreignNames.text: Посмотрите пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Вы можете показать карту существа из этих карт и положить ее в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты в низ вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.

foreignNames.name: 林野商谈
foreignNames.text: 检视你牌库顶的五张牌。 你可以展示其中的一张生物牌，并将其置于你手上。 将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

cards.originalText: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Craw Wurm
cards.flavor: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

foreignNames.name: Tatzelwurm
foreignNames.flavor: Das Schrecklichste am Tatzelwurm ist das furchtbar krachende Geräusch, mit dem er durch den Wald bricht. Der Lärm ist so laut, dass sein Echo von den Bäumen zurückgeworfen wird und von überall gleichzeitig zu kommen scheint.

foreignNames.name: Sierpe dragón
foreignNames.flavor: Lo más espeluznante de la sierpe dragón es probablemente el horrible estrépito que hace al moverse velozmente a través del bosque. Este ruido es tan fuerte que hace eco a través de los árboles y parece venir de todas direcciones al mismo tiempo.

foreignNames.name: Guivre vorace
foreignNames.flavor: Le plus terrifiant, ce sont les sinistres craquements de la guivre vorace qui chasse dans la forêt. Ils se répercutent dans les arbres et semblent venir de partout à la fois.

foreignNames.name: Wurm Devastatore
foreignNames.flavor: La cosa più terrificante del wurm devastatore sono probabilmente i terribili schianti che produce quando si muove rapidamente nella foresta. Il rumore è così forte che riecheggia tra gli alberi e sembra venire da tutte le direzioni contemporaneamente.

foreignNames.name: 大喰らいのワーム
foreignNames.flavor: このワームのいちばんの恐ろしさは、木々を砕いて森を進むときのすさまじい音にある。 その音は木々の間で激しくこだまし、まるで自分がその中心にいるような錯覚を起こさせるのだ。

foreignNames.name: Serpente Terrestre de Craw
foreignNames.flavor: Provavelmente, o que há de mais aterrador na serpente terrestre de craw é o horrível som de devastação que ela faz ao passar velozmente pela floresta. É um som tão alto que ecoa pelas árvores e parece vir de todos os lados.

foreignNames.name: Зобатый Вурм
foreignNames.flavor: Самое ужасное это то, с каким страшным шумом зобатый вурм продирается через лес. Шум отражается эхом меж деревьев, и кажется, что он звучит сразу со всех сторон.

foreignNames.name: 巨爪亚龙
foreignNames.flavor: 巨爪亚龙最可怕之处，大概便是他高速冲过森林时所造成的恐怖声响了。 那巨大的声响在树间回荡不歇，有如同时从四面八方而来。

cards.name: Creeping Mold
cards.text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
cards.flavor: Mold crept over the walls and into every crevice until the gleaming white stone strained and burst.

foreignNames.name: Schleichender Schimmel
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt, eine Verzauberung oder ein Land deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: Der Schimmel kroch über die Mauern und in jede Spalte, bis der glänzende weiße Stein sich verformte und zerbarst.

foreignNames.name: Moho reptante
foreignNames.text: Destruye el artefacto, encantamiento o tierra objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: El moho subió por los muros y entró en todas las grietas hasta que la brillante piedra blanca no aguantó más y se rompió.

foreignNames.name: Moisissure rampante
foreignNames.text: Détruisez l'artefact ciblé, l'enchantement ciblé ou le terrain ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor: « Il tombait en désuétude. La moisissure l'envahissait, les fleurs le quittaient. » —Victor Hugo, Les Misérables

foreignNames.name: Muffa Insidiosa
foreignNames.text: Distruggi un artefatto, un incantesimo o una terra bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: La muffa si arrampicò sulle mura e si insinuò in ogni crepa, fino a quando la bianca e scintillante pietra cedette ed esplose.

foreignNames.name: 忍び寄るカビ
foreignNames.text: アーティファクト１つかエンチャント１つか土地１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: カビは壁を越えて石の割れ目に入り込んだ。光る白い石はとうとう耐え切れずに破裂した。

foreignNames.name: Bolor Invasor
foreignNames.text: Destrua o artefato, encantamento ou terreno alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: O bolor espalhou-se pelas paredes e penetrou cada fenda, até que a reluzente pedra branca deformou-se e explodiu.

foreignNames.name: Ползучая Плесень
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевой артефакт, чары или землю.
foreignNames.flavor: Плесень покрыла все стены, проникла в каждую щель, пока блестящий белый камень не рассыпался от ее натиска.

foreignNames.name: 爬行腐霉
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标神器，结界，或地。
foreignNames.flavor: 腐霉爬过墙垣，侵入每处缝隙，直到白净的岩石支撑不住而爆裂。

cards.originalText: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

cards.name: Elven Riders
cards.text: Elven Riders can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.
cards.flavor: "Wirewood cannot hide great size. Only with speed and skill can we survive here."

rulings.text: Creatures with the Reach ability (such as Giant Spider) don’t actually have Flying, so they can’t block this.

foreignNames.name: Elfenreiter
foreignNames.text: Die Elfenreiter können außer von Mauern und/oder fliegenden Kreaturen nicht geblockt werden.
foreignNames.flavor: „Der Drahtholzwald eignet sich nicht gut zum Verstecken. Hier helfen uns nur Geschwindigkeit und Können zu überleben."

foreignNames.flavor: "Wirewood no puede esconder algo grande. Sólo con velocidad y habilidad podemos sobrevivir aquí."

foreignNames.name: Cavaliers elfes

foreignNames.flavor: « Brinbois ne saurait cacher les êtres de grande taille. Seules notre vitesse et notre astuce nous permettront de survivre ici. »

foreignNames.flavor: "Boscocavo non può nascondere le creature più grandi. Dovremo usare la velocità e l'astuzia per sopravvivere qui."

foreignNames.name: エルフの騎手

foreignNames.flavor: "Wirewood não pode esconder coisas grandes. Apenas com velocidade e perícia podemos sobreviver aqui."

foreignNames.name: Эльфийские Всадники

foreignNames.flavor: "Ничто большое не может укрыться в Вайервуде. Только скорость и сноровка помогут нам выжить здесь".

foreignNames.name: Эльфийский Берсерк

foreignNames.text: Portée (Cette créature peut bloquer les créatures avec le vol.)
foreignNames.flavor: « Quand j'ai suivi les enseignements de Multani, il m'a fait rester immobile pendant des heures à observer les araignées de la Yavimaya. C'est d'elles que j'ai appris la discrétion, la patience, et la meilleure méthode pour piéger un drakôn des vents. » —Mirri de l'Aquilon

foreignNames.name: Ragno Gigante
foreignNames.text: Raggiungere (Questa creatura può bloccare le creature con volare.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Mentre Multani mi istruiva, mi ha ordinato di sedere per ore a osservare i ragni di Yavimaya. Da loro ho appreso la furtività, la pazienza e il modo migliore per intrappolare un draghetto del vento." —Mirri della Cavalcavento

foreignNames.name: 大蜘蛛
foreignNames.text: 到達 （このクリーチャーは飛行を持つクリーチャーをブロックできる。）
foreignNames.flavor: ムルタニの下で修行してたとき、何時間も座ってヤヴィマヤの蜘蛛を見てろって言われたことがあるわ。 おかげで、忍び寄りとか、辛抱とか、風のドレイクを罠にかける最高の方法とかが学べたわね。 ――ウェザーライト号のミリー

foreignNames.name: Aranha Gigante
foreignNames.text: Alcance (Esta criatura pode bloquear criaturas com a habilidade de voar.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Durante meu treinamento com Multani, ele me ordenou a passar horas observando as aranhas de Yavimaya. Foi com elas que aprendi o valor da discrição e da paciência, o melhor modo de capturar um dragonete do vento." — Mirri dos Bons Ventos

cards.name: Llanowar Sentinel

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

Llanowar Sentinels can “chain”: If you put a second Llanowar Sentinel onto the battlefield as a result of this ability, that creature’s enters-the-battlefield ability triggers and allows you to search for yet another Llanowar Sentinel.

cards.name: Lure
cards.text:
Enchant creature
All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.
cards.flavor: Her true theft was to steal the soldiers away from their posts.

rulings.text: Lure doesn’t give any creatures the ability to block the target creature. It just forces those creatures that are already able to block the creature to do so.

As blockers are declared, any creature that’s tapped or affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t block doesn’t block. If there’s a cost associated with having the creature block, no player is forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t block if that cost isn’t paid.

cards.name: Rhox
cards.text:
You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
{2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

rulings.text: You can decide to assign damage to the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creature has protection from green or damage preventing effects on it.

When assigning combat damage, you choose whether you want to assign all damage to blocking creatures, or if you want to assign all of it to the player or planeswalker this creature is attacking. You can’t split the damage assignment between them.
If blocked by a creature with banding, the defending player decides whether or not the damage is assigned “as though it weren’t blocked”.

You do need to look carefully, however, as many effects say that the permanent does not untap during its controller’s untap step, and this card’s ability occurs during other players’ untap steps. foreignNames.name: Basilisco Silvestre

foreignNames.name: Сильванский Василиск

foreignNames.name: 森林蜥怪

foreignNames.flavor: 「我们还不清楚他长什么样子，所以为安全起见，在走出去前谁都不准瞧任何东西。」 ～资深探险家帕博准

foreignNames.name: Adivinación silvana

foreignNames.flavor: A un elfo le basta con vislumbrar su hogar para recordarlo durante semanas.

foreignNames.name: Regard sylvestre

foreignNames.flavor: Le basta scorgere la casa di un elfo per stare settimane nelle zone più selvagge.

foreignNames.name: 森の占術

foreignNames.flavor: 数週間前に一瞥しただけでも、故郷の景色はエルフの心に残り続ける。

foreignNames.name: Сильванское Гадание

foreignNames.flavor: Один взгляд на родное жилище позволяет эльфу продержаться несколько недель на диких просторах.

foreignNames.flavor: 为了瞥一眼地精的房舍，她得在原野中待上好几周。

cards.name: Upwelling
cards.text: Players don't lose unspent mana as steps and phases end.
cards.flavor: Freyalise promised a dawn that would never end, a day of limitless life. As many dread her promise as revere it.

rulings.text: Players can keep mana in their pool indefinitely while this is on the battlefield, but once it leaves the battlefield, they have until the end of the current step (or phase) to use the mana before it disappears.

foreignNames.name: Ausströmen
foreignNames.text: Manavorräte werden am Ende von Phasen oder Zügen nicht mehr geleert. (Dieser Effekt verhindert Manabrand.)
foreignNames.flavor: Freyalise versprach eine Morgendämmerung, die nie enden würde, einen Tag unbeschränkten Lebens. Viele hassen sie für dieses Versprechen, ebensoviele verehren sie dafür.

foreignNames.name: Manar
foreignNames.text: Las reservas de maná no se vacían al final de fases o turnos. (Este efecto evita la quemadura de maná.)
foreignNames.flavor: Freyalise les prometió un amanecer que nunca terminaría, un día con vida ilimitada. Hay tantos que admiran su promesa como los que le temen.

foreignNames.name: Montée
foreignNames.text: Les réserves de mana ne se vident pas à la fin des phases ou des tours. (Cet effet empêche les brûlures de mana.)
foreignNames.flavor: Freyalise promit une aube éternelle, un jour de vie illimitée. Ceux qui redoutent sa promesse sont aussi nombreux que ceux qui la vénèrent.

foreignNames.name: Innalzare
foreignNames.text: Le riserve di mana non si svuotano alla fine delle fasi o dei turni. (Questo effetto non provoca eccesso di mana.)
foreignNames.flavor: Freyalise promise un'alba senza fine, un giorno di vita illimitata. Per quanti temono la sua promessa altrettanti la venerano.

foreignNames.name: 湧出

foreignNames.name: Preenchimento
foreignNames.text: As reservas de mana não são esvaziadas no final de fases ou turnos. (Este efeito impede a queimadura de mana.)
foreignNames.flavor: Freyalise prometeu uma aurora que jamais terminaria, um dia de vida ilimitada. Sua promessa é tanto temida quanto reverenciada.

foreignNames.name: 木の壁

foreignNames.name: Barreira de Madeira

foreignNames.name: 木墙

cards.originalText: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment in play.

cards.name: Aspect of Wolf
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +X/+Y, where X is half the number of Forests you control, rounded down, and Y is half the number of Forests you control, rounded up.

rulings.text: The effect is continuously updated based on the number of Forests you control at any given time.

cards.originalText: Target creature's power and toughness are increased by half the number of forests you have in play, rounding down for power and up for toughness.

cards.name: Berserk
cards.text:
Cast this spell only before the combat damage step.
Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

rulings.text: If the permanent stops being a creature before the end of the turn, it is still destroyed.

cards.originalText: Until end of turn, target creature's current power doubles and it gains trample ability. If it attacks, target creature is destroyed at end of turn. This spell cannot be cast after current turn's attack is completed.

cards.name: Birds of Paradise
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.originalText:
Flying
Tap to add one mana of any color to your mana pool. This tap may be played as an interrupt.

cards.name: Camouflage
cards.text:
Cast this spell only during your declare attackers step.
This turn, instead of declaring blockers, each defending player chooses any number of creatures they control and divides them into a number of piles equal to the number of attacking creatures for whom that player is the defending player. Creatures those players control that can block additional creatures may likewise be put into additional piles. Assign each pile to a different one of those attacking creatures at random. Each creature in a pile that can block the creature that pile is assigned to does so. (Piles can be empty.)
cards.originalText: You may rearrange your attacking creatures and place them face down, revealing which is which only after defense is chosen. If this results in impossible blocks, such as non-flying creatures blocking flying creatures, illegal blockers cannot block this turn.

cards.name: Channel
cards.text: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.

rulings.text: Once your life total is 0, you can’t pay any more life, even if you’ve somehow not lost the game yet.

cards.originalText: Until end of turn, you may add colorless mana to your mana pool, at a cost of 1 life each. These additions are played with the speed of an interrupt. Effects that prevent damage may not be used to counter this loss of life.

cards.name: Cockatrice
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Cockatrice blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

rulings.text: The ability destroys the creature at the end of the combat, which is after all first strike and normal damage dealing is done. This means that a creature may have to regenerate twice to survive the combat, once from damage and once again at end of combat.

cards.originalText:
Flying
Any non-wall creature blocking Cockatrice is destroyed, as is any creature blocked by Cockatrice. Creatures destroyed in this way deal their damage before dying.

cards.name: Craw Wurm
cards.flavor: The most terrifying thing about the Craw Wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

cards.name: Elvish Archers
cards.text: First strike
cards.flavor: I tell you, there was so many arrows flying about you couldn't hardly see the sun. So I says to young Angus, "Well, at least now we're fighting in the shade!"
cards.originalText: First strike

cards.name: Fastbond
cards.text:
You may play any number of lands on each of your turns.
Whenever you play a land, if it wasn't the first land you played this turn, Fastbond deals 1 damage to you.

rulings.text: You take damage when you play a land using the “play a land” action. Such an action can be your regular “play a land”, one enabled by Fastbond, or ones enabled through other effects.
You do not take damage when you “put a land onto the battlefield” through the effect of a spell or ability.

cards.originalText: You may put as many lands into play as you want each turn. Fastbond does 1 damage to you for every land beyond the first that you play in a single turn.

cards.name: Fog
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
cards.originalText: Creatures attack and block as normal, but none deal any damage. All attacking creatures are still tapped. Play any time before attack damage is dealt.

cards.name: Force of Nature
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.
cards.originalText:
Trample
You must pay oGoGoGoG during upkeep or Force of Nature does 8 damage to you. You may still attack with Force of Nature even if you failed to pay the upkeep.

cards.name: Fungusaur
cards.text: Whenever Fungusaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: Rather than sheltering her young, the female Fungusaur often injures her own offspring, thereby ensuring their rapid growth.

rulings.text: If more than one creature damages it at one time, it only gets one counter.

cards.originalText: Each time Fungusaur is damaged but not destroyed, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Gaea's Liege
cards.text:
As long as Gaea's Liege isn't attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. As long as Gaea's Liege is attacking, its power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests defending player controls.
{T}: Target land becomes a Forest until Gaea's Liege leaves the battlefield.

rulings.text: When being declared as an attacker, use the “not attacking” power and toughness. It only changes after declaration is complete.
The activated ability doesn’t affect whether the land is basic or not. It overwrites any other land types. Being a Forest gives the affected land the ability “{T}: Add {G}.”
Will not add or remove Snow Supertype to or from a land.

cards.originalText: When defending, Gaea's Liege has power and toughness equal to the number of forests you have in play; when it's attacking, they are equal to the number of forests opponent has in play. Tap to turn any one land into a forest until Gaea's Liege leaves play. Mark changed lands with counters, removing the counters when Gaea's Liege leaves play.

cards.name: Giant Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
cards.originalText: Target creature gains +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Giant Spider
cards.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor: While it possesses potent venom, the Giant Spider often chooses not to paralyze its victims. Perhaps the creature enjoys the gentle rocking motion caused by its captives' struggles to escape its web.

rulings.text: This card now uses the Reach keyword ability to enable the blocking of flying creatures. This works because a creature with flying can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.

cards.originalText: Does not fly, but can block flying creatures.
